Solutions to Exercises

Solution to Exercise 3:

  1. (i)

    We have f⁢(x)=x3, and so

    f⁢(x+h)-f⁢(x)h =(x+h)3-x3h
    =x3+3⁢h⁢x2+3⁢h2⁢x+h3-x3h
    =3hx2++3h2x+h3h=3⁢x2+3⁢h⁢x+h2
  2. (ii)

    Hence

    f′⁢(x)=limh→0⁡(3⁢x2+3⁢h⁢x+h2)=3⁢x2.

Solution to Exercise 5:

dd⁢x⁢(15⁢x-2x3-x42) =dd⁢x⁢(15⁢x-2⁢x13-12⁢x4)
=15-2⋅13⁢x-23-12⋅4⁢x3=15-23⁢x-23-2⁢x3.
